name: FantasyForest
0:
”Alexa open Fantasy Forest”
”Alexa ask Fantasy Forest to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fantasy forest
des:
Step into an enchanted forest filled with the magical sounds of a fantasy world. Immerse yourself in the sounds of forest creatures, whispering trees, and gentle breezes, creating an otherworldly atmosphere that stimulates the imagination and soothes the soul.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Fantasy Forest
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
